item.description:
The Latin and Swing lounge is a chance to kick back and dances the Rythm dances Hustle, Swing and Latin.
My favourite is West Coast Swing of course.

Singles and couples are welcome. The regulars are pretty friendly.

A lot of the ABL staff attend the dance parties and are very easy to dance with!

Showing up for the lesson at 7:00 is a good way to get to know a few people before the party starts at 8:00.

There is a cash bar. Free snacks and coffee.

The cover charge is $15.

The lesson will be Mambo!

group.name: Salsa, Swing, Latin & Ballroom Dancers of Metro Worcester

item.name: Latin and Swing Lounge
